summary_text: A new PlayStation 5 ad appears to include a mysterious tease for an unannounced game. Some fans believe it may be the next Uncharted game, and that it will star Nathan Drake and Elena Fishers daughter, Cassie. The footage does not appear to match any released or announced game from Sony Interactive Entertainment.

Loewe x Howls Moving Castle drops on February 2, but you can also sign up for early access, which will launch on February 1. This will be Loewes third and final Studio Ghibli collaboration, following its popular My Neighbor Totoro capsule series in 2021, and its Spirited Away series in 2022.

Peacock's new murder mystery, Poker Face, premiered last Thursday. The show stars Natasha Lyonne as a woman who can tell when people are lying. Showrunners Nora and Lilla Zuckerman say it's by design that Charlie Cale is so relatable.

February 2023 is the 10th year of Xbox Games With Gold. The February 2023 pair on offer are For the King and Guts N Goals, both for Xbox One (compatible with Xbox Series X) Xbox Live Gold membership costs $9.99 a month and is mainly for online multiplayer.

James Camerons Avatar: The Way of Water is a romantic fantasy of a world untouched by the depravities of modern, capitalistic, and militaristic civilization. At the same time, all the impressive visual-effects energy put toward portraying the natural wonders of Pandora is equally committed to rendering vehicles and weapons of war in similar, painstakingly realistic detail.

Netflix has released a first look at its live-action adaptation of One Piece. The poster shows Iaki Godoy as protagonist Monkey D. Luffy. The series is set to premiere sometime in 2023. There is still no firm release date or trailer as of yet, but the arrival of the latest take on the manga is well within sight.

In the last 24 hours, Bitcoin (BTC) dropped 1.68 percent to $23,094.92. Other tokens like Litecoin, EOS and XRP also fell as much as 3 percent. Global cryptocurrency market cap was trading well above $1 trillion, rising over 1.5 percent.

MATIC's token price dropped by almost 6% in amoment after today's more than $10 million sale by the whale. According to the data cited, on top of the 9.46 million MATICs stored in the hot wallet, the whale has another 73.3 million tokens locked up in staking.

Intella X, Neowizs Web3 gaming platform, has revealed its initial ecosystem partners. The platforms initial gaming ecosystem consists of 30+ top-tier global partners from various sectors. Intella X will make its global debut on Polygon in the first quarter of 2023.

Bitcoin has climbed 2.2% over the last 24 hours, trading at $23,741.74. The second most popular token, Ethereum, has risen 2.4% from yesterday to trade at $1,638.07. The market capitalization of Bitcoin and Ethereum stands at $457.56 billion and $197.64 billion, respectively.

Amazon broke above a months-long trend line resistance a few weeks ago. The stock is approaching the tricky 102.00  107.00 zone that may rain on the bulls parade. The area lines up with a key support in June and then in October, which is also close to the 38.2% Fibonacci retracement level.

Long, Long Time, the third episode of The Last of Us on HBO Max, starring Parks and Recreations Nick Offerman in a guest role as Bill. The episode is widely considered one of the best episodes of television to come out in 2016, and is still appreciated for being basically the only episode of Black Mirror.

Three episodes in, HBOs The Last of Us is a faithful adaptation of the original video game from 2013. Series co-creators Craig Mazin and Neil Druckmann are making strategic adjustments to certain elements of the game for the new medium. The filmmakers made another major change in the third episode, and it is unequivocally for the better.

Star Trek: The Next Generation returns for its final season. Stars Patrick Stewart, Jeri Ryan, and Michelle Hurd return. Brent Spiner will pick up his fourth discrete character in the shows history. Daniel Davis is back to play Professor Moriarty, the sentient hologram version of Data.

Rumor: 14-inch, 16-inch MacBook Pros coming in September.July 2, 2021. Smart Spacers are the Ultimate Table Divider for any table. Conference Tables, Portable / Folding Tables, Rectangle Tables, Round Conference Tables. Assisted Living, Banquet and Events, Clampless Versions.

The Cordyceps infection evolves over the course of an infected persons lifespan. Clickers, a later stage, are blind, with mushroom-like growths splitting open their faces and obscuring their vision. Bloaters and Shamblers are slower but really strong, and can have a surge of energy to lunge toward an enemy.

Mahokenshi is a tactics game set in a world of Japanese-style folklore. You control magic-wielding samurai from four elemental schools. Missions play out on hex-based maps where you direct your samurai to explore and battle. Every mission resets your deck to a few basic starter cards, and you need to build a new deck on the fly.

The new version of the popular sci-fi video game Dead Space is out now. The film is a remake of the original from 2008. It is available to stream for free on Amazon, Google Play and Roku. Here are some of the best movies based on the game.

Polygon's native token, MATIC, and the Mina Protocol token are up more than 18% as the week draws to a close. Their growth would seem to be in harmony with the general market environment, but it could be argued that a number of investors are buying these tokens based on a particular narrative.

Four senior U.S. officials urge Congress to "step up" efforts to regulate the cryptocurrency market. "It would be a grave mistake to enact legislation that reverses course and deepens the ties between cryptocurrencies and the broader financial system," they said. The statement has been broadly welcomed by the crypto industry that's still reeling from the collapse of FTX.

An early MATIC whale makes an unexpected move by selling millions worth of tokens amid the massive rise of the asset on the market. In exchange for Polygon's token, the whale grabs some DAI. The first MATIC transaction on the whale's wallet occurred when the token was trading at $0.02. Early holder sold 4.5 million tokens in exchange for 5.2 million DAI at the average price of $1.14.

Polygon (MATIC) is a Layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum. It provides users with faster transactions and lower costs as a parallel blockchain. Polygon was first launched back in 2017 as the Matic Network. The MATIC token is Polygons native currency, used to pay for transaction fees on the network.

The game seems to scream: This is a JRPG! This is an isekai! There might be some glorious anime bullshit in here! Even smaller details, like the stone landmark, reminded me of Xenoblade Chronicles Gaur Plain. Despite its initial promise, much of Freys time in Athia unfolds without much whimsy or the requisite amount of levity.

The cast of Critical Role returns for season 2 of the animated fantasy series. This time, the cast plays the first group of misfit mercenaries from the very first campaign. The animated series gives the actors a chance to dive into more of their characters backstories. The show also takes the show outside the storytellers POV.

Isaac Clarke is now a voiced protagonist, and he regularly chips in on the teams plans. He saves his teammates lives early on with a clever suggestion, and can tell what the next quest objective is by glancing at some schematics or a damage report. Isaac finds only a few scant souls left alive on the Ishimura, and most of them exist only to die.

The Addams Family leaves Netflix on Feb. 1. The Paper Tigers hits all the notes you want. Mamma Mia! is the perfect antidote to the winter days, with Colin Firth, Amanda Seyfried and Meryl Streep in the cast. HBO Max has a new sci-fi action series, The Expanse, which premieres on February 14.

Solana is 3,000 times better than Ethereum, and 1,000 better than Bitcoin. Polygon is the Internet of Blockchains and a layer-2 scaling solution. Big Eyes Coin is a meme coin that incorporates the functions of De-Fi, offered by Ethereum itself, into its ecosystem.

Bitcoin has shed 0.1% over the last 24 hours and is now trading at $22,988.84. It is 1.2% higher than the previous week. The top five gainers on the basis of the 24-hour movement are Gala, Trust Wallet Token, Avalanche, Frax Share, and Enjin Coin. The biggest losers of the day are Threshold, Theta Network, eCash, UNUS SED LEO, and ApeCoin.

You People, the latest comedy-drama from Black-ish creator Kenya Barris starring Jonah Hill and Eddie Murphy comes to Netflix this week. The new action rom-com Shotgun Wedding, starring Jennifer Lopez and Josh Duhamel, premieres on Prime Video. Todd Fields Oscar-nominated psychological drama Tr is finally available to stream on Peacock.

Starfield was supposed to launch in the first half of 2023. Microsoft and Bethesda have not said if the game has been delayed. Redfall and The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom are two big Bethesda projects launching in May and June. Microsoft's 2023 game calendar now looks like this: Minecraft Legends, Forza Motorsport.

Shinichir Watanabe, the director of the original Cowboy Bebop, has spoken out about Netflix's live-action adaptation of the popular anime. He said he was disappointed with the series and that he felt he should have been involved. The series premiered in November 2021 and was canceled the following month.

M&Ms parent company Mars Wrigley announced that it would be pulling its M&Ms spokescandies mascots indefinitely. However, the company told the New York Times on Friday that the controversial move was all just a PR stunt. The company said the mascots are taking a break for the time being, but the Super Bowl ad will resolve the situation.

Dungeons & Dragons publisher Wizards of the Coast will abandon attempts to alter the Open Gaming License (OGL) The announcement comes after weeks of virulent anger from fans and third-party publishers. The OGL was developed and refined in the lead-up to D&D 3rd edition, and a version of it has been in place for more than 20 years.

You'll arrive in the Facility in GoldenEye 007 after jumping from the dam after the first level. There are a variety of objectives you must complete, with one of them being the first randomized objective - finding the double agent. Read on to figure out how to find Dr. Doak, rendezvous with 006, and destroy the gas tanks with ease.

GoldenEye 007 Dam is the first mission in the GoldenEye series. You're dropped at the base of a dam in the former Soviet Union. Your job is to infiltrate the facility and intercept the shipping and contact information. Depending on your difficulty, you have to neutralize the alarms, intercept the data, and bungee jump to safety.

Greninja is being added to the Pokmon Scarlet and Violet roster via seven-star Tera Raids. This event-exclusive raid is a higher difficulty, just like the last ones. Greninja has its Hidden Ability, Protean, which changes its type to the type its about to use.

On Feb. 28, 2023, Bungie will release Destiny 2: Lightfall, the shared world shooters largest content drop since last years critically acclaimed The Witch Queen expansion. Here we break down everything you need to know to best prepare for Lightfall. We also give you a guide to Exotic armor, emotes, weapons, sparrows and ships.

Hi-Fi Rush was released on Jan. 25 on Windows PC and Xbox Series X. The game was reviewed on Xbox. The gorgeous animations and Jet Set Radio-esque art style are vivid and arresting. The vibrant, positive energy is present in every beat, keeping you tapping your feet as you take down a corporation built on a lack of vision.

The Peng treasure can be found in Chapter 11, Alternate Solutions, when Isaac is tasked with moving the Marker. Youll need to kill an Exploder Necromorph first, but immediately to Isaacs left will be a small cluster of lockers partially obscured by a couple kinesis crates and a corpse.

Polygon (MATIC) is a Layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum. It provides users with faster transactions and lower costs as a parallel blockchain. Polygon was first launched back in 2017 as the Matic Network. The network raised the equivalent of $5.6 million in TH with the sale of 1.9 billion MATIC tokens.

Polygon (MATIC) is a Layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum. It provides users with faster transactions and lower costs as a parallel blockchain. Polygon was first launched back in 2017 as the Matic Network. The MATIC token is Polygons native currency, used to pay for transaction fees on the network.

Cincinnati Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow is an avid Super Smash Bros. player. Burrow also dropped that he's a Ness main. The Bengals will play in the AFC championship game this Sunday. The winner will advance to the Super Bowl against the Philadelphia Eagles or the San Francisco 49ers.

Netflix's new comedy You People wades into the difficulties and awkwardness of interracial romance. Directed by Kenya Barris, the film follows Ezra Cohen, a white Jewish guy who falls in love with Amira Mohammed, a Black Muslim woman. The film comes across as both insincere as a whole, and disingenuous when it comes to Ezras character.

HBO announced Friday that The Last of Us will return for a second season. The third episode of the series, Long Long Time, premieres Sunday at 9 p.m. EST. The first season covers the events of the 2013 video game of the same name. That leaves Naughty Dogs 2020 sequel, The Last Of Us Part 2, for season 2.

Motive Studios remake of sci-fi survival horror classic Dead Space is excellent, filling in the gaps and addressing shortcomings of the original 2008 game. Secret alternative ending provides stronger connective tissue to the original games sequel, 2011s Dead Space 2. New Game Plus mode requires finding 12 Marker fragments scattered throughout the game.

Polygon has become the second biggest platform in DAU. Binance Smart Chain (BSC), also known as BNB Chain, has 781,000 daily active users. Cardano boasts 76,254 daily active Users, according to an anonymous Cardano-themed account called ADA whale.

The movie picks up right after the third season finale where stubborn and prideful student council members Miyuki Shirogane and Kaguya Shinomiya finally admitted their feelings for one another. The movie will be in theaters for a two-day special event kicking off on Feb. 14.

"Cat Person" premiered this week at the 2023 Sundance Film Festival. The film is based on a short story from the late 2010s. Critic: "Cat Person gets it wrong so consistently, makes its points so inelegantly" "It ends up invalidating the same concerns on which its built," says critic.

Fox has renewed The Simpsons for two more seasons. The animated series is the longest-running scripted sitcom in television history. It is also one of Disney's only streaming hits. The Simpsons is currently on hiatus, with new episodes set to premiere later this year. The renewal also comes with good news for Bobs Burgers and Family Guy.

Like A Dragon: Ishin! is a stand-alone entry; neither a sequel nor direct prequel to the mainline Like A Dragon/Yakuza games. The historical Bakumatsu period setting only made some elements of the game even funnier. There are dozens, if not hundreds of swords, spears, pistols, cannons, bits of armor, and other items to unlock and upgrade throughout the game.
